    About

    My background is in classical music, but in the last years I have gotten more and more interested in the field of machine learning and artificial intelligence. At the moment I am finishing my Master thesis at the Bosch Center for Artificial Intelligence. Right before that I got my Master’s degree in piano from the University of Music Stuttgart.

    Contact me vincent.herrmann@web.de
